jishoData.meaning: break, destroy, censure, be chipped, be scratched, be broken, be ruined

onyomiExamples.meaning: breaking, demolishing, smashing, destroying, wrecking, being broken, being ruined, being destroyed, being worn out

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to destroy, to break, to damage
to break, to destroy, to demolish, to wreck, to ruin, to spoil, to damage, to break (a bill, etc.)
to be chipped, to be nicked

to be broken, to break, to fall apart, to collapse, to be destroyed, to be damaged, to break (down), to stop working, to fall through (of a plan, deal, etc.), to collapse, to break down (of a relationship, negotiations, etc.), to be broken off, to be ruined (of an atmosphere, one's image, etc.)
